name: Compliance Dashboard Access - Alliant Admin
description: Alliant Admin users can click on the Compliance Dashboard module to navigate to a companies list view and access detailed compliance information for each company.

background.text: I am on the application at https://2bd642eb.taruvi-testconsole.pages.dev/insurer-claims-dashboard
I am logged in as an Alliant Admin user

scenarios.name: Alliant Admin successfully views Compliance Dashboard module on home page

steps.text: I am on the home page
I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
the module should display with "Compliance Dashboard" title

scenarios.name: Alliant Admin successfully navigates to companies list view

steps.text: I am on the home page
I can see the Compliance Dashboard module
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
I should see the companies list view

scenarios.name: Companies list view displays all company records with correct columns

steps.text: I have navigated to the Compliance Dashboard companies list view
I should see records of all companies
the list should contain the "Company Name" column
the list should contain the "Action" column
each company record should display the client company name

scenarios.name: View Details action button displays correctly for each company

steps.text: I am viewing the companies list in the Compliance Dashboard
each company record should have an Action button
the Action button should display "View Details" text
I am viewing the companies list in the Compliance Dashboard
I click the "View Details" button for a specific company
I should be directed to the Compliance Dashboard
the dashboard should display details related to that company only

scenarios.name: Multiple companies display with individual View Details actions

steps.text: I am viewing the companies list in the Compliance Dashboard
there are multiple companies in the list
each company should have its own "View Details" button
clicking different View Details buttons should show different company details

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module not visible for non-Alliant Admin users

steps.text: I am logged in as a non-Alliant Admin user
I am on the home page
I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module

scenarios.name: Error handling when companies list fails to load

steps.text: I have clicked on the Compliance Dashboard module
there is a server error preventing data loading
I should see an appropriate error message
the error should indicate that company data could not be retrieved

scenarios.name: Navigation fails when View Details clicked on invalid company record

steps.text: I am viewing the companies list in the Compliance Dashboard
there is a company record with invalid or missing data
I click the "View Details" button for that company
I should see an error message
I should not be navigated away from the companies list

scenarios.name: Unauthorized access attempt to Compliance Dashboard URL

steps.text: I am not logged in as an Alliant Admin user
I attempt to directly access the Compliance Dashboard URL
I should be denied access
I should see an unauthorized access message

scenarios.name: Empty companies list displays appropriate message

steps.text: I have navigated to the Compliance Dashboard companies list view
there are no companies in the system
I should see a message indicating no companies are available
the Company Name and Action columns should still be visible

scenarios.name: Single company record displays correctly in list view

steps.text: there is exactly one company in the system
I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard companies list view
I should see one company record
the single company should have a functioning "View Details" button

scenarios.name: Company with very long name displays properly in list

steps.text: there is a company with a very long name in the system
I view the companies list in the Compliance Dashboard
the long company name should be displayed properly
the list layout should remain functional
the "View Details" button should remain accessible

gherkin_content:
Feature: Compliance Dashboard Access - Alliant Admin
  Alliant Admin users can click on the Compliance Dashboard module to navigate to a companies list view and access detailed compliance information for each company.

  Background:
    Given I am on the application at https://2bd642eb.taruvi-testconsole.pages.dev/insurer-claims-dashboard
    And I am logged in as an Alliant Admin user

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Alliant Admin successfully views Compliance Dashboard module on home page
    Given I am on the home page
    Then I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And the module should display with "Compliance Dashboard" title

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Alliant Admin successfully navigates to companies list view
    Given I am on the home page
    And I can see the Compliance Dashboard module
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
    And I should see the companies list view

  @positive @data-display
  Scenario: Companies list view displays all company records with correct columns
    Given I have navigated to the Compliance Dashboard companies list view
    Then I should see records of all companies
    And the list should contain the "Company Name" column
    And the list should contain the "Action" column
    And each company record should display the client company name

  @positive @ui-elements
  Scenario: View Details action button displays correctly for each company
    Given I am viewing the companies list in the Compliance Dashboard
    Then each company record should have an Action button
    And the Action button should display "View Details" text

  @positive @navigation
  Scenario: Successfully view company-specific compliance details
    Given I am viewing the companies list in the Compliance Dashboard
    When I click the "View Details" button for a specific company
    Then I should be directed to the Compliance Dashboard
    And the dashboard should display details related to that company only

  @positive @multiple-records
  Scenario: Multiple companies display with individual View Details actions
    Given I am viewing the companies list in the Compliance Dashboard
    And there are multiple companies in the list
    Then each company should have its own "View Details" button
    And clicking different View Details buttons should show different company details

  @negative @authorization
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module not visible for non-Alliant Admin users
    Given I am logged in as a non-Alliant Admin user
    When I am on the home page
    Then I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module

  @negative @error-handling
  Scenario: Error handling when companies list fails to load
    Given I have clicked on the Compliance Dashboard module
    And there is a server error preventing data loading
    Then I should see an appropriate error message
    And the error should indicate that company data could not be retrieved

  @negative @data-integrity
  Scenario: Navigation fails when View Details clicked on invalid company record
    Given I am viewing the companies list in the Compliance Dashboard
    And there is a company record with invalid or missing data
    When I click the "View Details" button for that company
    Then I should see an error message
    And I should not be navigated away from the companies list

  @negative @security
  Scenario: Unauthorized access attempt to Compliance Dashboard URL
    Given I am not logged in as an Alliant Admin user
    When I attempt to directly access the Compliance Dashboard URL
    Then I should be denied access
    And I should see an unauthorized access message

  @edge-case @empty-state
  Scenario: Empty companies list displays appropriate message
    Given I have navigated to the Compliance Dashboard companies list view
    And there are no companies in the system
    Then I should see a message indicating no companies are available
    And the Company Name and Action columns should still be visible

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Single company record displays correctly in list view
    Given there is exactly one company in the system
    When I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard companies list view
    Then I should see one company record
    And the single company should have a functioning "View Details" button

  @edge-case @ui-boundary
  Scenario: Company with very long name displays properly in list
    Given there is a company with a very long name in the system
    When I view the companies list in the Compliance Dashboard
    Then the long company name should be displayed properly
    And the list layout should remain functional
    And the "View Details" button should remain accessible
